DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, heal 1 HP.
At the end of your turn deal damage equal to the amount of Dark Arts and remove them.
Attack Damage is reduced by 60%. (Increases reduction by 2% per stack)
On attack lose 3 HP, The next attack played to an enemy deals double damage. (Increases by 0.5 per stack)
At the end of the turn, enemy takes 10 damage. (Increases damage by 2 per stack)
